abstract: The combination of “Deal or No Deal” and the new game show “My Dad is Better Than Your Dad” lifted NBC to a solid No. 1 finish in the ratings on Monday.
snippet: The combination of “Deal or No Deal” and the new game show “My Dad is Better Than Your Dad” lifted NBC to a solid No. 1 finish in the ratings on Monday.
lead_paragraph: The combination of “Deal or No Deal” and the new game show “My Dad is Better Than Your Dad” lifted NBC to a solid No. 1 finish in the ratings on Monday. According to Nielsen’s estimates, the new show — which pits father-child teams against each other — attracted 9.8 million viewers at 9 p.m., a respectable showing but far less than the 16.9 million who tuned in for “Deal or No Deal” at 8 p.m.

headline.main: Game Shows on NBC Led the Ratings on Monday
